com.scalar.database.api

Class Selection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.database.api.Operation
      • com.scalar.database.api.Selection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Get, Scan

    public abstract class Selection
extends Operation
    An abstraction for the selection operations such as Get and Scan.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this object. The other object is considered equal if:
        • both super class instances are equal and
        • it is also an Selection and
        • both instances have the same projections
        Overrides:
        equals in class Operation
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be tested for equality
        Returns:
        true if the other object is "equal to" this object otherwise false
